SEARCH
Package fr.istic.aco.editor.ClassImpl

Class RecorderImpl

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.ClassImpl.RecorderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Recorder
public class RecorderImpl extends Object implements Recorder
Implementation of the Recorder interface for recording and replaying command execution sequences along with their states (mementos).

    Replays all recorded commands in the current session by restoring their mementos and executing them.
    void
    save(CommandOriginator c)
    Saves a command along with its memento if recording is enabled and replaying is not in progress.

    Starts recording commands and clears the current recording list.

    • getHistorique

      public List<Pair<CommandOriginator,Memento>> getHistorique()
      Retrieves the history of all executed commands.
      Returns:
      a list of all executed commands and their states

    • replay

      public void replay()
      Replays all recorded commands in the current session by restoring their mementos and executing them. Saves the replayed commands into the history.
      Specified by:
      replay in interface Recorder

      Retrieves the number of commands in the current recording list.

      public boolean isReplaying()
      Checks if the recorder is currently replaying commands.
      Specified by:
      isReplaying in interface Recorder
      Returns:
      true if replaying is in progress, otherwise false
